Literature.Title: Efficient Exploitation of Multiple Novel Bacteriocins by Combination of Complete Genome and Peptidome.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (29.81%) toBM1122GRAVY: -0.841; Mol formula: C418H651N101O141S5; M. Wt:   9570.654; molar extinction coefficient: 12590.Activity:   Diffusion zone assay: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 29213, 25923 (18.8 mm), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (11 mm), L. monocytogenes CMCC 54004 (17.9 mm),  Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 (17 mm), Salmonella CMCC 50071 (17.7 mm), C. sakazakii ATCC 29544 (19.4 mm), also active against antibiotic0resistant C. sakazakii (17.4-18 mm) and Salmonella 557D (13.9 mm).
